definition: Kunming Lake
used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
variant of 崑|昆[kun1]
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]

sentences.english: Look, Kunming lake surrounded by long embankment.
sentences.chinese: 看，昆明湖旁围着长长地堤岸。

sentences.english: The Kunming Lake is famous for its clean water.
sentences.chinese: 昆明湖以它净净的湖水著名于世。

sentences.english: The windows open on a beautiful view of the Kunming Lake.
sentences.chinese: 从窗口可以看到昆明湖的美景。

sentences.english: And the Longevity Hill and Kunming Lake to the composition of scenic and tourist.
sentences.chinese: 以及以万寿山和昆明湖等构成的景物游览区。

sentences.english: Atop Longevity Hill, overlooking Kunming Lake, is the Listening to the Orioles Pavilion Restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 在万寿山顶上，俯瞰昆明湖，是听鹂馆。

sentences.english: However, after we clear the rockery, we will reach Kunming Lake.
sentences.chinese: 然而，当我们清出假山，我们将会到达昆明湖。

sentences.english: The Summer Palace covers an area of 290 hectares, including the areas of Kuming Lake and Longevity Hill.
sentences.chinese: 颐和园占地290公顷，包括昆明湖和万寿山。

sentences.english: The two main elements of the garden are Longevity Hill and Kunming Lake.
sentences.chinese: 颐和园最主要的两大景点是万寿山和昆明湖。

sentences.english: Kunming Lake was enlarged in order to imitate the West Lake in Hangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 为了效仿杭州的西湖，昆明湖被再次扩建。

sentences.english: Bare trees cast lacy likenesses on Kunming Lake in Beijing, China.
sentences.chinese: 裸树把它的花边肖像投射到中国北京的昆明湖里。

sentences.english: Return on the east side of Kuming lake so that you eventually reach the '17 Arch Bridge'.
sentences.chinese: 从东面的昆明湖回来后，最后会到十七孔桥。

sentences.english: You see, this is the rippling Lake Kunming.
sentences.chinese: 大家往前看，这就是碧波荡漾的昆明湖。

sentences.english: The West Dike spans from northwest to south on the Kunming Lake, dividing the lake into two parts.
sentences.chinese: 西堤从西北到南部横跨昆明湖，把湖面分为两半。

sentences.english: Kunming Lake was created by extending an existing body of water to imitate the West Lake in Hangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 昆明湖通过扩大原有面积，模仿杭州西湖而成。

sentences.english: Rental rowboats crowd a shoreline of Beijing's Kunming Lake.
sentences.chinese: 租的划艇拥堵在北京昆明湖的岸边。

sentences.english: The Kuming Lake is the largest lake in all the imperial gardens.
sentences.chinese: 昆明湖是所有皇家园林中最大的湖。

definition: Summer Palace in Beijing
area to the west of the Forbidden City, now divided into Zhongnanhai and Beihai
Tower of Buddhist Incense in the Summer Palace 頤和園|颐和园[Yi2 he2 yuan2], Beijing
Shichahai, scenic area of northwest Beijing with three lakes
Jingshan (name of a hill in Jingshan park)
Longevity Hill in the Summer Palace 頤和園|颐和园[Yi2 he2 yuan2], Beijing
Jingshan Park (park in Beijing)
Daming Lake in Jinan 濟南|济南[Ji3 nan2], Shandong
Seventeen-Arch Bridge in the Summer Palace 頤和園|颐和园[Yi2 he2 yuan2], Beijing
Yuanmingyuan, the Old Summer Palace, destroyed by the British and French army in 1860
Marble Boat, famous pavilion
Xihu or West lake (place name)/West Lake in Hangzhou 杭州, Zhejiang/Xihu or Hsihu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
the Forbidden City/the Imperial Palace in Beijing/same as 故宮|故宫[Gu4 gong1]
lake Dianchi in Yunnan
Temple of Heaven (in Beijing)
Donghu district of Nanchang city 南昌市, Jiangxi
